mapper.insert: insert into off_gb(off_no, userid, off_subject, off_content,location,group_num,current_num, app_time,deaddate,off_hit,writedate) values(off_no_sq.nextval,#{userid},#{off_subject},#{off_content}, #{location},${group_num},${current_num},#{app_time},#{deaddate},${off_hit},#{writedate})
mapper.select: select * from off_gb order by off_no desc
